Regarding Plots.jl(GR backend)
For Pluto

Yeah... something like that....
The images displayed by Plots and the images displayed LocalResource/Resource in Pluto display differently
The one in Plots has a scroll bar to scroll along the width, while the one by LocalResource/Resource gets weirdly scaled.....
